sentences.en: How can you be so thoughtless?
How could she have been so thoughtless?
sentences.cn: 她怎么会粗心到这个地步,居然说出那样的话来 呢 ?

sentences.en: How very thoughtless. I'll give him a piece of my mind.
sentences.cn: 真是太没头脑了，我要告诉他我很生气。

sentences.en: I wonder why you are so thoughtless of others.
sentences.cn: 我很奇怪,你为何如此不替别人着想.

sentences.en: It is thoughtless of her to keep us waiting so long.
sentences.cn: 她让我们等这么久,真是一点也不替人着想.

sentences.en: It is thoughtless of you to do so.
It was just a thoughtless remark.
sentences.cn: 那不过是一句欠考虑的话。

sentences.en: It was rather thoughtless of him, to say the least.
sentences.cn: 至少可以说, 他太粗心了.

sentences.en: It was thoughtless of her to mention it.
sentences.cn: 她提起这事有些欠考虑。

sentences.en: It was thoughtless of you to eat all the cake and leave none for me.
sentences.cn: 你把蛋糕都吃了,一点也不留给我,这太自私了.

sentences.en: It was thoughtless of you to forget your sister's birthday.
sentences.cn: 你真粗心,把你姐姐的生日都给忘了.

sentences.en: It was very thoughtless of you to keep her waiting so long.
sentences.cn: 你让她等那麽久也太不体谅人了.

sentences.en: The book expresses neither shallow criticism nor thoughtless phrase.
sentences.cn: 小说既不发空泛的批评,也不作轻率的赞扬.

sentences.en: Thoughtful men ought not to be thoughtless about the drought.
sentences.cn: 体贴的人不应该对干旱考虑不周。
我为什么这样粗心大意?

words.tran_cn: 能想到的；可相信的；可考虑的；可能的
思考的；思想的；有理性的；好思考的
思考；思想；想法；意见；见解
想，思考；认为（think的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 欠考虑的，轻率的，自私的，不体贴人的，没有思想的
trans.tran_en: not thinking about the needs and feelings of other people, especially because you are thinking about what you want
